programme.title: Predicting elections
programme.short_synopsis: How did Ross Perot affect the result of the 1992 presidential election?
programme.medium_synopsis: Complex methods for predicting  presidential election results, and the effect  Ross Perot had on the outcome, are discussed by Alistair Cooke.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Predicting elections

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
